text:
Tech? Practices? Mindset? Culture?
Are we sure that all this is on the shelf in the local store!
Yes, @holly_cummins, you are right, and we must be cautious that cloud-enabled is not cloud-native!
#WTFisCloudNative https://t.co/oV3lOdgEsd

author.description: Senior tech exec | 2021 Awarded CTO | CTO at @orangebusiness | Board advisor @weaveworks @cycloid_io | Speaker | @TechRocksFr curator | Bike addict
author.name: Philippe Ensarguet
